dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Oh, the God of Dance is back! I'm..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, the God of Dance is back! I'm dancing with the God of Dance!" He dances over to you, moving in a slightly less lame manner.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Oh, hey, man! It's good to see you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, hey, man! It's good to see you." He dances over to you in an inexplicably soft-core manner. It's embarrassing.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Yeah. It's all set up, man! Can yo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yeah. It's all set up, man! Can you already imagine a thousand people in here?! Ten thousand?!" He waves his hands in an unbelievably lame, non-hard-core manner.

links.title: Andre: ""Ecstatic vibrations! Totally trans..."
links.text: "Ecstatic vibrations! Totally transcendent! And I've finished setting up the new compressor too!" He looks at the imposing black box in the corner that's churning out the sound.

links.title: Andre: ""Now the only thing left to do is t..."
links.text: "Now the only thing left to do is the name of the club. Will you do the honours, detective?"

links.title: You: ""What do you propose as the name, A..."
links.text: "What do you propose as the name, Andre?"

links.title: Andre: ""The name..." He appears to mull it..."
links.text: "The name..." He appears to mull it over, one hand idly touching his hair. "Everything I manage to come up with sounds just *wrong*."

links.title: Acele: ""Andre's overthinking it," says the..."
links.text: "Andre's overthinking it," says the girl with the microphone.

links.title: Noid: ""Yes, *you* should do it, detective..."
links.text: "Yes, *you* should do it, detective." The speedfreak with yellow beads around his neck is looking at you. "It would be good for the sines."

links.title: Andre: ""Noid's right. You've helped us so..."
links.text: "Noid's right. You've helped us so much, it's the right thing to do."

links.title: You: ""Acele, what would you suggest as t..."
links.text: "Acele, what would you suggest as the name?"

links.title: Acele: ""How about something simple, like '..."
links.text: "How about something simple, like 'The Club'?"

links.title: Andre: ""Too modern," Andre shakes his spik..."
links.text: "Too modern," Andre shakes his spiky head. "And too ironic. We don't want ironic, we want *real*. Real and true and beautiful, like a morning after the rave."

links.title: You: ""Egg Head, you must have a lot of i..."
links.text: "Egg Head, you must have a lot of ideas."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEKOKATAA!" The freak with the lar..."
links.text: "YEKOKATAA!" The freak with the large head yells from the stage, waving his hand in the air. "THE PLACE TO BE!"

links.title: Acele: ""Yekokataa, the zone of ecological..."
links.text: "Yekokataa, the zone of ecological catastrophe? That's too morbid, Egg. Got anything else?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""HARD CORE!" A witless, victorious..."
links.text: "HARD CORE!" A witless, victorious smile adorns his face. "HARD CORE TO THE MEGA!"

links.title: Andre: ""No, it has to be bigger than Hard..."
links.text: "No, it has to be bigger than Hard Core." Andre looks worried as he comes to this realization. "Yes, it has to be even bigger than *Hard Core to the Mega*, it has to be bigger than the scene!"

links.title: You: ""Noid, give me your two cents on th..."
links.text: "Noid, give me your two cents on the issue."

links.title: Noid: ""The Amnesia.""
links.text: "The Amnesia."

links.title: Acele: ""Like... the I-can't-remember-the-n..."
links.text: "Like... the I-can't-remember-the-name-of-the-club amnesia?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""AMNESIA!""
links.text: "AMNESIA!"

links.title: Andre: ""It's not Amnesia, guys.""
links.text: "It's not Amnesia, guys."

links.title: You: ""Soona, do you have an opinion on t..."
links.text: "Soona, do you have an opinion on this?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""I don't.""
links.text: "I don't."

links.title: Noid: ""Good, we have too many opinions an..."
links.text: "Good, we have too many opinions anyway."

links.title: You: ""Kim, how would you name the club?""
links.text: "Kim, how would you name the club?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't. I wouldn't build a clu..."
links.text: "I wouldn't. I wouldn't build a club and I wouldn't name it either."

links.title: Andre: ""An underground place with no name?..."
links.text: "An underground place with no name? Sounds like something the crab-man would say."

links.title: Acele: ""We're not going with anything the..."
links.text: "We're not going with anything the crab-man would say."

links.title: Noid: ""Why not? The crab-man has *ideas*,..."
links.text: "Why not? The crab-man has *ideas*, Acele. Ideas from another level of consciousness!"

links.title: Acele: ""I don't care, I don't like the cra..."
links.text: "I don't care, I don't like the crab-man and I don't like his ideas, his ideas are spooky. Next, please!"

links.title: You: ""I think I've come up with a name....."
links.text: "I think I've come up with a name..." (Proceed.)

links.title: Andre: ""You have?" Andre stops touching hi..."
links.text: "You have?" Andre stops touching his hair. "Well, what's the name?"

links.title: You: ""Disco Elysium.""
links.text: "Disco Elysium."

links.title: Noid: ""Like that Dolorian word for the wo..."
links.text: "Like that Dolorian word for the world, you mean? Elysium..."

links.title: Acele: ""But *Disco* Elysium..." She looks..."
links.text: "But *Disco* Elysium..." She looks unsure. "Isn't it wacky? Disco's kind of gone, isn't it? Forgotten."

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE PAST IS THE FUTURE, BUT THE FU..."
links.text: "THE PAST IS THE FUTURE, BUT THE FUTURE IS DEAD!"

links.title: Andre: ""No, it's beautiful. Beautiful and..."
links.text: "No, it's beautiful. Beautiful and brave! Like we want it to be."

links.title: Noid: ""*And* short. *And* memorable!""
links.text: "*And* short. *And* memorable!"

links.title: Acele: ""It's settled, then. Everyone, welc..."
links.text: "It's settled, then. Everyone, welcome to Disco Elysium!" A light beam washes over the dance floor, bathing it in violet blue.

links.title: You: ""No Truce with the Furies.""
links.text: "No Truce with the Furies."

links.title: Andre: ""What does that mean?" he yells ove..."
links.text: "What does that mean?" he yells over the thumping music.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course, he had to smuggle in 'f..."
links.text: "Of course, he had to smuggle in 'furies' somehow..." the lieutenant mumbles to himself.

links.title: Acele: ""It's too long. No one's going to r..."
links.text: "It's too long. No one's going to remember it on a Friday night."

links.title: Egg Head: ""NO TRUCE!""
links.text: "NO TRUCE!"

links.title: Noid: ""Egg's right, they can call it 'No..."
links.text: "Egg's right, they can call it 'No Truce' if it's too long. At least it stands out from the others, it *evokes* something, it's victorious."

links.title: Andre: ""And yet mysterious." He looks arou..."
links.text: "And yet mysterious." He looks around the church as light beams wash over the dance floor, bathing it in violet blue.

links.title: Acele: ""It's settled, then. Everyone, welc..."
links.text: "It's settled, then. Everyone, welcome to No Truce with the Furies!"

links.title: You: ""Revachol West.""
links.text: "Revachol West."

links.title: Andre: ""Wow, it's big. A club for entire R..."
links.text: "Wow, it's big. A club for entire Revachol West? So big!"

links.title: Acele: ""Sounds like money.""
links.text: "Sounds like money."

links.title: Egg Head: ""SOUNDS LIKE FUTURE!""
links.text: "SOUNDS LIKE FUTURE!"

links.title: Noid: ""It's settled, then. Everyone, welc..."
links.text: "It's settled, then. Everyone, welcome to Revachol West!" He looks around the church as light beams paint the dance floor violet blue.

links.title: Shivers: "The wind brings some snow in from t..."
links.text: The wind brings some snow in from the broken gallery. It wraps you in its embrace, cold and luminous. You should return to the mural soon, to the one that said: Tomorrow is just a whisper away.

links.title: Andre: "Andre breaks into frenzied dance-li..."
links.text: Andre breaks into frenzied dance-like motion to celebrate the name. Someone turns up the beat.

links.title: Suggestion: "You should go with the flow. Join i..."
links.text: You should go with the flow. Join in on the experience.

links.title: You: "Start tapping your foot."
links.text: Start tapping your foot.

links.title: Suggestion: "It feels good, it feels right... bu..."
links.text: It feels good, it feels right... but what is this? What is this *thing* that Andre is doing with his limbs?!

links.title: You: "(I don't care.) "Cool, let's move o..."
links.text: (I don't care.) "Cool, let's move on to the questions then."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes, my man!" He jumps up and down..."
links.text: "Yes, my man!" He jumps up and down with glee, his moves punctuated by the stroboscopic flash of the club lights.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Audio waves thump against your rib..."
links.text: Audio waves thump against your rib cage. The speaker set-up makes everything sound much better... but the *BEAT* is still so weak.

links.title: Logic: "What if... you re-routed the terrif..."
links.text: What if... you re-routed the terrifying audio assault that the lead programmer's microphone setup picks up through this compressor?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Audio waves thump against your rib..."
links.text: Audio waves thump against your rib cage. The speaker set-up makes everything sound much better... but there's a noticeable lack of something.

links.title: You: "(Observe his movement.) "What are y..."
links.text: (Observe his movement.) "What are you doing, Andre?"

links.title: Andre: ""I'm dancing!" He performs yet anot..."
links.text: "I'm dancing!" He performs yet another strange pattern of moves, but it doesn't look very cool or modern. Honestly, it looks kind of lame...

links.title: Conceptualization: "That soft-core gyrating is supposed..."
links.text: That soft-core gyrating is supposed to be *dancing*?

links.title: You: ""We should talk about it. We should..."
links.text: "We should talk about it. We should talk about your so-called 'dancing'."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes, my man!" He jumps up and down..."
links.text: "Yes, my man!" He jumps up and down with glee, his moves punctuated by the stroboscopic flash of the club lights.

links.title: Composure: "Talk? What is there to talk about i..."
links.text: Talk? What is there to talk about if you can express yourself with *moves*?

links.title: You: ""The Return.""
links.text: "The Return."

links.title: Andre: ""The Return? What's that?!""
links.text: "The Return? What's that?!"

links.title: Noid: ""The Return. I like the sound of it.""
links.text: "The Return. I like the sound of it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant isn't saying anythin..."
links.text: The lieutenant isn't saying anything -- he's watching you, observing.

links.title: Acele: ""Guys, we can't do The Return. Ther..."
links.text: "Guys, we can't do The Return. There are like tons of places called The Return already. There's this communist joint in Jamrock that my friends like to frequent, and then there's this really famous radio show, you know the one..."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, okay, we're not doing The Re..."
links.text: "Okay, okay, we're not doing The Return." Andre turns to you and shrugs. "Sorry, cop-man. Got anything else?"

links.title: You: ""No -- it's THE RETURN and that's i..."
links.text: "No -- it's THE RETURN and that's it." (Name the club.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAGH! A RETURN TO *LE RETOUR*!""
links.text: "YEAGH! A RETURN TO *LE RETOUR*!"

links.title: Noid: ""It's settled, then. Everyone, welc..."
links.text: "It's settled, then. Everyone, welcome to THE RETURN!" He looks around the church as light beams paint the dance floor violet blue.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I think I have a few other i..."
links.text: "Okay, I think I have a few other ideas..." (Choose another name.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAGH, TIME TO MAKE THE FINAL CHOI..."
links.text: "YEAGH, TIME TO MAKE THE FINAL CHOICE!"

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""I knew it! The man is back for tho..."
dialogueTree.text: "I knew it! The man is back for those sweet, sweet questions!" The young man smiles at you. "What will it be?"

links.title: You: ""I've been meaning to ask you, what..."
links.text: "I've been meaning to ask you, what's with the hair?"

links.title: Andre: ""It's to express my individuality.""
links.text: "It's to express my individuality."

links.title: Perception: "Is that a bald spot? It's hard to t..."
links.text: Is that a bald spot? It's hard to tell for sure with the fused-together spikes, but it looks like he's balding.

links.title: You: ""Or is it because you're balding?""
links.text: "Or is it because you're balding?"

links.title: Andre: ""...or because I'm balding, yes. I..."
links.text: "...or because I'm balding, yes. I want to fuse the remains of my hair together, before it leaves me."

links.title: Andre: ""I wanna show my hair: I don't give..."
links.text: "I wanna show my hair: I don't give a fuck how old you think I am. I'm twenty!"

links.title: You: ""How old *are* you, Andre?""
links.text: "How old *are* you, Andre?"

links.title: Andre: ""Not twenty.""
links.text: "Not twenty."

links.title: You: ""Is it important for you? To be an..."
links.text: "Is it important for you? To be an individual?"

links.title: Andre: ""Of course it is, otherwise I'd jus..."
links.text: "Of course it is, otherwise I'd just be another poor guy with no education and no money. General-issue, man. Now I'm all that -- *and* I have radical spikes."

links.title: You: ""Fair enough.""
links.text: "Fair enough."

links.title: Andre: "He looks at the molten toothbrush...."
links.text: He looks at the molten toothbrush. "Maybe it was a bad idea... anyway."

links.title: You: ""That's idiotic.""
links.text: "That's idiotic."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes it is, man. Absolutely.""
links.text: "Yes it is, man. Absolutely."

links.title: You: ""About the church door...""
links.text: "About the church door..."

links.title: Andre: ""Hmm... But she's in there somewher..."
links.text: "Hmm... But she's in there somewhere, *has* to be. Have you tried investigating the machines?" He tilts his head, one hand touching the spikes in his hair. "Anyway, do let us know if you see her..."

links.title: You: ""What's the status of the church? I..."
links.text: "What's the status of the church? I haven't gotten inside the building yet."

links.title: You: ""I'll look into it. Tell me more."..."
links.text: "I'll look into it. Tell me more." (Get the task.)

links.title: Andre: ""Alright, man!" He claps his hands..."
links.text: "Alright, man!" He claps his hands enthusiastically.

links.title: Empathy: "Andre is obviously very happy you t..."
links.text: Andre is obviously very happy you took him seriously. The whole tent is. The boys exchange giddy looks.

links.title: You: ""I'll make up my mind later. I have..."
links.text: "I'll make up my mind later. I have questions for you first." (Not now.)

links.title: Andre: ""*Alright*, man!" He claps his hand..."
links.text: "*Alright*, man!" He claps his hands, enthusiastically...

links.title: Volition: "...with the sort of glee that's mea..."
links.text: ...with the sort of glee that's meant to imply you've already taken on the case.

links.title: You: ""The police have more important thi..."
links.text: "The police have more important things to do right now, kid." (Not now.)

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon, man, at least *think* about..."
links.text: "C'mon, man, at least *think* about it first. It's our lives at stake here, our *dreams!* I'm sure you'll see things differently once you've let me explain it... You guys like questions, right? Cops *love* questions, ask me some! You'll see!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah!" His comrade nods his huge h..."
links.text: "Yeah!" His comrade nods his huge head along to the bass. "You got questions -- we got answers!"

links.title: Noid: ""I bet he's got a shit-load of ques..."
links.text: "I bet he's got a shit-load of questions."

links.title: Volition: "He's right. All those sweet questio..."
links.text: He's right. All those sweet questions waiting to be answered... you can choose to let them go, though. There will be plenty of questions to ask at another time. Or even from other people -- from people on the *island*.

links.title: You: ""Okay, maybe just a few questions...""
links.text: "Okay, maybe just a few questions..."

links.title: Andre: ""That's the spirit!""
links.text: "That's the spirit!"

links.title: You: ""Nope." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Nope." [Leave.]

links.title: Volition: "He's right. All those sweet questio..."
links.text: He's right. All those sweet questions waiting to be answered... you can choose to let them go, though. There will be plenty of questions to ask at another time. Or even from other people.

links.title: Andre: ""Yes -- it's a matter of occupied..."
links.text: "Yes -- it's a matter of occupied  ecclesiastical property. I bet you've noticed the derelict hive of *narcomania* on the coast?"

links.title: Authority: "Finally someone who understands the..."
links.text: Finally someone who understands the plight of narcomania! Play it cool, you might have an ally here.

links.title: You: ""Narcomania..." (Nod thoughtfully.)..."
links.text: "Narcomania..." (Nod thoughtfully.) "What exactly are we talking about here?"

links.title: Andre: ""I'm talking about the church. And..."
links.text: "I'm talking about the church. And I'm not exaggerating! Even a place of spiritual refuge can become a magnet for all sorts of *dopeheads* and *burnouts* if left unattended..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Dopeheads!""
links.text: "Dopeheads!"

links.title: Noid: ""Burnouts!" He angrily spits on a s..."
links.text: "Burnouts!" He angrily spits on a screw, then starts cleaning it.

links.title: Andre: ""Well, I'm sad to say, that's exact..."
links.text: "Well, I'm sad to say, that's exactly what happened. Sad because we were just about to put Martinaise on the map with one of the maddest dance clubs in Jamrock -- no, strike that -- in Revachol..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Strike that -- the world!""
links.text: "Strike that -- the world!"

links.title: Volition: "An attempt to pander to your percei..."
links.text: An attempt to pander to your perceived conservative sensibilities. No person his age would ever use a word like *narcomania* with a straight face. Don't fall for it!

links.title: You: ""Enough histrionics. What are you t..."
links.text: "Enough histrionics. What are you talking about?"

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: You: ""Who exactly are these people insid..."
links.text: "Who exactly are these people inside the church?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "A half-hearted sell of something wh..."
links.text: A half-hearted sell of something which does not seem worth buying.

links.title: You: ""Okay... maybe I'm kinda feeling it.""
links.text: "Okay... maybe I'm kinda feeling it."

links.title: Andre: ""You'll get there, believe me... wh..."
links.text: "You'll get there, believe me... when we've got our gear set up. Things will be flowin' and pumpin'..."

links.title: Andre: ""Anyway, now that it's settled... h..."
links.text: "Anyway, now that it's settled... how did she seem? I mean, disposition-wise, about the dance club idea? 'Ja' oder 'Nein'? Rockin' it or droppin' it?"

links.title: You: ""She said you guys haven't been com..."
links.text: "She said you guys haven't been completely honest with me about your plans."

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon, man. Who will you trust, a..."
links.text: "C'mon, man. Who will you trust, a spooky programmer or us? We just wanna make the world a better place."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Feel the love! GET DOWN AND FEEL I..."
links.text: "Feel the love! GET DOWN AND FEEL IT!" The stuffy tent muffles the last two words. The command fails to impress.

links.title: You: ""She did not like the anodic dance..."
links.text: "She did not like the anodic dance club idea."

links.title: Noid: ""What a pity! That's my favourite t..."
links.text: "What a pity! That's my favourite thing in the world." He drops a hammer back into a toolbox. "And she doesn't like it at all."

links.title: Andre: ""A shame." He sighs. "What can we d..."
links.text: "A shame." He sighs. "What can we do now? Do you see a way out of this jam -- and into a laser-lit future of dance and unity?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""UNITY! DANCE!""
links.text: "UNITY! DANCE!"

links.title: You: ""She made it very clear that she wo..."
links.text: "She made it very clear that she won't leave until her own project is finished."

links.title: Andre: ""And you can't just evict her?""
links.text: "And you can't just evict her?"

links.title: You: ""No, I *won't* evict her. We have t..."
links.text: "No, I *won't* evict her. We have to come up with a different solution."

links.title: Noid: ""Look at you, honour-man.""
links.text: "Look at you, honour-man."

links.title: Andre: ""No, Noid. He's right... maybe we'v..."
links.text: "No, Noid. He's right... maybe we've approached it the wrong way after all. I'm sure there's a workaround. We can make a deal not to bother her."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I *can't* evict her. I tried..."
links.text: "Yeah, I *can't* evict her. I tried, but she quoted the Wayfarer Act, and she's actually correct about it, so..."

links.title: Andre: ""We can figure something out, right..."
links.text: "We can figure something out, right, guys? Work out a deal. We can run the club without bothering her."

links.title: Andre: ""If that's okay with her... We only..."
links.text: "If that's okay with her... We only wanna get in the church and spread the joy and ecstasy of music."

links.title: Egg Head: ""The lines in the dark, exist, CO-E..."
links.text: "The lines in the dark, exist, CO-EXIST!"

links.title: Noid: ""At least crab-man seems like an *a..."
links.text: "At least crab-man seems like an *advanced* being. He's hard. He'll understand."

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, he can do his climbing thing..."
links.text: "Yeah, he can do his climbing thing in the tower. And the programmer... does she like anodic dance music?"

links.title: You: ""She *absolutely* does not. Really..."
links.text: "She *absolutely* does not. Really truly despises it."

links.title: Egg Head: "Egg head cannot believe what you ju..."
links.text: Egg head cannot believe what you just said. It makes him pump the jam a *little* slower for a moment, but then he returns to the full swing of it.

links.title: Andre: ""No worries. We'll figure it out."..."
links.text: "No worries. We'll figure it out." The man nods enthusiastically, then leans in and whispers: "If co-existing fails, you can always muscle her out, right? If... it's all okay with you. What do you think?"

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "She gets down. I mean, who..."
links.text: (Lie.) "She gets down. I mean, who doesn't? Just listen to that crazy pulse!"

links.title: Andre: ""Wonderful!" He nods enthusiastical..."
links.text: "Wonderful!" He nods enthusiastically, then leans in and whispers: "If co-existing fails, you can always muscle her out, right? If... it's all okay with you. What do you think?"

links.title: Suggestion: "Remember -- the island isn't going..."
links.text: Remember -- the island isn't going anywhere. It's not like it's going to *sail away* or *disappear*. Take it easy!

links.title: You: ""Perhaps if you dropped the drug la..."
links.text: "Perhaps if you dropped the drug lab, it might make it easier to convince her."

links.title: Andre: "He looks around the tent. "Aww man,..."
links.text: He looks around the tent. "Aww man, but the drug lab was like an *integral* part of getting the club going."

links.title: Noid: ""For me it was my favourite part. C..."
links.text: "For me it was my favourite part. Chemistry is great. Besides, imagine all the drugs we could do if we had our own drug lab."

links.title: Noid: ""I mean, anodic music is great and..."
links.text: "I mean, anodic music is great and all, but drugs -- they make you feel really good. When did you last feel really, really good?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Exxcccccitement bubbles up in you -..."
links.text: Exxcccccitement bubbles up in you -- maybe you should blast some of these drugs right here in this tent?!

links.title: You: ""You're right, I only ever feel goo..."
links.text: "You're right, I only ever feel good when I'm blasting some high-grade narcotics. Then I feel *great*!"

links.title: Noid: ""See?""
links.text: "See?"

links.title: Logic: "That's only because you're constant..."
links.text: That's only because you're constantly hung over from said 'high-grade narcotics'. Getting clean takes *months*.

links.title: You: ""Hey, who needs drugs when you've g..."
links.text: "Hey, who needs drugs when you've got a bottle of beer or two?"

links.title: Noid: ""No, but you see, no one likes *dru..."
links.text: "No, but you see, no one likes *drunk* people, drunk people get into fights and try to hit on everyone. Now, people on *speed*, however..."

links.title: Composure: "Just dance for hours, one with the..."
links.text: Just dance for hours, one with the night!

links.title: Logic: "Are pretty much the same, but inste..."
links.text: Are pretty much the same, but instead of falling asleep at the 12th hour they go on for *24 hours straight*.

links.title: You: ""I don't have time to feel good, I'..."
links.text: "I don't have time to feel good, I'm a very busy officer of the law."

links.title: Noid: ""Pull out that stick, law-man. You'..."
links.text: "Pull out that stick, law-man. You'd absolutely *love* drugs. They'll make you feel transcendent."

links.title: You: ""Never. I've never felt good in my..."
links.text: "Never. I've never felt good in my entire life."

links.title: Noid: ""But that's exactly what drugs are..."
links.text: "But that's exactly what drugs are for. Exactly. Time to expand your mind!"

links.title: You: ""I refuse to throw her out, but I c..."
links.text: "I refuse to throw her out, but I can try convincing her." (Proceed with the quest.)

links.title: Andre: ""Excellent! Good luck, my friend."..."
links.text: "Excellent! Good luck, my friend." He smiles wide, like a replica of his friend with the large head.

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'll see how it goes." (P..."
links.text: "Alright, I'll see how it goes." (Proceed with the quest.)

links.title: You: ""I *could* go for another try. Brin..."
links.text: "I *could* go for another try. Bring down the hammer of the law."

links.title: Noid: ""Hell yeah." He picks up a small ha..."
links.text: "Hell yeah." He picks up a small hammer and holds it out, ritualistically.

links.title: Andre: ""No, Noid. No hammer. I'm sure ther..."
links.text: "No, Noid. No hammer. I'm sure there's a workaround. We can, like, make a deal not to bother her? You know, co-exist."

links.title: You: ""I don't have time for this. My leg..."
links.text: "I don't have time for this. My leg hurts from running around, and I have to get to the island..." (Look at the tent flap.)

links.title: Andre: ""Come on, man! Just talk to her --..."
links.text: "Come on, man! Just talk to her -- I'm sure there's a workaround. Pretty please? We can run the club without bothering her."

links.title: You: ""She did not like it, and the drug..."
links.text: "She did not like it, and the drug lab didn't really help either."

links.title: Noid: ""What a pity! Those are my two favo..."
links.text: "What a pity! Those are my two favourite things in the world." He drops a bundle of screws into his toolbox.

links.title: Noid: ""Drugs and anodic music, I mean. An..."
links.text: "Drugs and anodic music, I mean. And she doesn't like either one of them. Some people are just *born* retrograde."

links.title: You: ""I was so intimidated, I didn't dar..."
links.text: "I was so intimidated, I didn't dare to ask her..."

links.title: Andre: ""Come on, man. You've gotta talk to..."
links.text: "Come on, man. You've gotta talk to her for us!" He attempts to conceal his disappointment.

links.title: Andre: ""Report back to me when you've done..."
links.text: "Report back to me when you've done so, alright? We're counting on you!"

links.title: You: ""The love? No, I'm really not feeli..."
links.text: "The love? No, I'm really not feeling it at all."

links.title: You: ""About the church... I checked it o..."
links.text: "About the church... I checked it out."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes? What's the deal?""
links.text: "Yes? What's the deal?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing. I just walked around a bi..."
links.text: "Nothing. I just walked around a bit. There was no one inside."

links.title: Andre: ""Hmm... but you *did* see the machi..."
links.text: "Hmm... but you *did* see the machines, right? And the spooky water basins set up in a ritualistic circle in the middle of the church?"

links.title: Andre: ""I tell you, they're in there... Yo..."
links.text: "I tell you, they're in there... You just have to give it another go."

links.title: You: ""I saw a shadow-clad being climbing..."
links.text: "I saw a shadow-clad being climbing the beams. A man-beast!"

links.title: Andre: ""Wow! What happened next?""
links.text: "Wow! What happened next?"

links.title: Drama: "A courageous cop-man such as thysel..."
links.text: A courageous cop-man such as thyself surely did not flee in fear from a mere mortal!

links.title: You: ""You won't believe it. I stood my g..."
links.text: "You won't believe it. I stood my ground, bravely staring him down, but suddenly -- fire started shooting out of his eyes! It was out of this world."

links.title: Andre: ""You're right, I don't believe the..."
links.text: "You're right, I don't believe the last part... sounds like one of the cheap *literature fantastique* novels. Always full of otherworldly sorceries and hokey stuff."

links.title: Andre: ""That must have been the crab-man...."
links.text: "That must have been the crab-man. It's okay if you got spooked and ran away." He hums to himself. "I think you should go talk to him -- figure out the situation, see what he wants."

links.title: You: ""I... came here to *report* what I..."
links.text: "I... came here to *report* what I saw. The crab-man."

links.title: Andre: ""But you didn't talk to him?" He hu..."
links.text: "But you didn't talk to him?" He hums to himself. "I think you should go back -- figure out the situation, see what he wants."

links.title: You: ""I ran away -- it was terrifying.""
links.text: "I ran away -- it was terrifying."

links.title: Andre: ""Uh... c'mon, that was just the cra..."
links.text: "Uh... c'mon, that was just the crab-man. You're a brave cop, maybe you should go back and talk to him. Figure out the situation, see what he wants."

links.title: You: ""I talked to the shadow-clad being..."
links.text: "I talked to the shadow-clad being climbing the beams -- a man living on the ceiling!"

links.title: Andre: ""Oh man! Who is he, what did you th..."
links.text: "Oh man! Who is he, what did you think?"

links.title: You: ""Seemed okay, to be honest. Very sp..."
links.text: "Seemed okay, to be honest. Very spiritual."

links.title: Andre: ""Really? Huh... interesting. What's..."
links.text: "Really? Huh... interesting. What's he doing in the church?"

links.title: You: ""Just preaching and praying, from t..."
links.text: "Just preaching and praying, from the looks of it."

links.title: Noid: ""No matter," the paranoid young man..."
links.text: "No matter," the paranoid young man mumbles gruffly. "Is he going to be a problem?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, Noid is right... let's get b..."
links.text: "Yeah, Noid is right... let's get back to the point. What are we going to *do* about him?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "These guys will never catch him. Yo..."
links.text: These guys will never catch him. You will never catch him. There's nothing to do.

links.title: You: ""Of course he's a problem -- he's a..."
links.text: "Of course he's a problem -- he's a *crab-man*!"

links.title: Andre: ""So...?" He rubs his chilled hands..."
links.text: "So...?" He rubs his chilled hands together.

links.title: You: ""A *crab-man*, man!!!""
links.text: "A *crab-man*, man!!!"

links.title: Andre: ""I hear you, friend. What about it?""
links.text: "I hear you, friend. What about it?"

links.title: You: ""It's impossible to catch someone w..."
links.text: "It's impossible to catch someone who climbs walls like a freaking spider-crab."

links.title: You: ""He keeps himself physically active..."
links.text: "He keeps himself physically active, thinks spiritual thoughts and doesn't drink. Who am I to evict such a person?"

links.title: Andre: ""But he's likely up to no good." An..."
links.text: "But he's likely up to no good." Andre shakes his head. "He's a crab-man, man... a menace to society."

links.title: You: ""I doubt that. Besides, I'm pretty..."
links.text: "I doubt that. Besides, I'm pretty sure it's impossible to catch him climbing up there."

links.title: You: ""As far as I can tell he's not goin..."
links.text: "As far as I can tell he's not going to leave. He'll climb around up there, and guys, you'll never catch him."

links.title: Andre: ""I dunno, man... doesn't it feel li..."
links.text: "I dunno, man... doesn't it feel like a major hindrance to you?" He rubs his jaw. "A spooky guy climbing around when all the guests are trying to have nice friendly hyper-time?"

links.title: You: ""You're just going to have to live..."
links.text: "You're just going to have to live with the crab-man."

links.title: Noid: ""I guess it's not a *massive* probl..."
links.text: "I guess it's not a *massive* problem, now that I think of it."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Everyone is welcome -- to dance ti..."
links.text: "Everyone is welcome -- to dance till the morning light! YEAGH!"

links.title: Andre: ""Maybe... uh... I guess we'll figur..."
links.text: "Maybe... uh... I guess we'll figure something out. Okay, but what about the other spooker -- the one in grandma's clothes? Did you see her?"

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, I don't think he real..."
links.text: "Don't worry, I don't think he really gives a damn about you or anyone else."

links.title: You: ""Actually, he told me he wouldn't m..."
links.text: "Actually, he told me he wouldn't mind the nightclub at all."

links.title: You: ""He clearly enjoys the physical act..."
links.text: "He clearly enjoys the physical activity. Guy climbs like a freak!"

links.title: You: ""There's something sinister going o..."
links.text: "There's something sinister going on under the building's roof... I think he's getting high or something."

links.title: Andre: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure, I'm just telling you..."
links.text: "I'm not sure, I'm just telling you what it *felt* like."

links.title: You: ""It didn't sound like a sober man's..."
links.text: "It didn't sound like a sober man's talk. He must be getting *visions* up there."

links.title: You: ""He gave me this odd lecture on alc..."
links.text: "He gave me this odd lecture on alcoholism, before rambling on and on about Mother's love."

links.title: You: ""You were right, he's a true narcom..."
links.text: "You were right, he's a true narcomaniac. And the way he climbs! It was terrifying."

links.title: Andre: ""Right? There's something really od..."
links.text: "Right? There's something really odd about him... what's he doing in the church anyway?"

links.title: Andre: ""Oh man, the crab-man, you mean! Wh..."
links.text: "Oh man, the crab-man, you mean! Who is he, what did you think?"

links.title: You: ""I didn't see the other spooker, ju..."
links.text: "I didn't see the other spooker, just some machines."

links.title: You: ""I was using the mainframe when Soo..."
links.text: "I was using the mainframe when Soona, the former lead programmer of Fortress Accident, appeared."

links.title: Andre: ""A programmer? That's odd. What was..."
links.text: "A programmer? That's odd. What was she like? Did you ask her about the nightclub?"

links.title: You: ""Soona agreed with your nightclub p..."
links.text: "Soona agreed with your nightclub plan, but I promised to help her with her project first. It's going to take some time."

links.title: Andre: ""Alright. Do what you gotta do, man..."
links.text: "Alright. Do what you gotta do, man. We trust you." He looks at his posse, then back at you, smiling. "If you need any help, let us know."

links.title: You: ""I'm making progress in the church,..."
links.text: "I'm making progress in the church, but it's slow going. There's a hitch in Soona's research."

links.title: Andre: ""What kind of a hitch?""
links.text: "What kind of a hitch?"

links.title: You: ""She's trying to catch an anomaly u..."
links.text: "She's trying to catch an anomaly using a special microphone set up, but she can't hear the audio coming through her headphones."

links.title: Noid: ""An audio shortfall, you say?" The..."
links.text: "An audio shortfall, you say?" The other speedfreak points his thumb toward the speaker in the back. "Guess what, we've got speakers with *massive* low end. There's a good chance it can do it."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "They've got one speaker. One. Uno...."
links.text: They've got one speaker. One. Uno. Un.

links.title: You: ""I think we have found a solution.""
links.text: "I think we have found a solution."

links.title: Andre: ""We've got some serious range on th..."
links.text: "We've got some serious range on this baby." He nods. "It'll blast her shoes off, believe me."

links.title: You: ""I'm not really so sure it's about..."
links.text: "I'm not really so sure it's about the lack of bass, but I'll see what Soona thinks."

links.title: You: ""Good news! I managed to convince S..."
links.text: "Good news! I managed to convince Soona. She's okay with you guys moving in, but on one condition -- she needs your speakers for her project."

links.title: Andre: ""We are grateful, cop-man. You're a..."
links.text: "We are grateful, cop-man. You're an augury of a new era of *ANODIC DANCE MUSIC*." The speedfreak smiles, happier than he's ever been before.

links.title: You: ""You're going to have to share spac..."
links.text: "You're going to have to share space for a couple of weeks until she gets her research finished."

links.title: Andre: ""That's fine, we can manage." He gr..."
links.text: "That's fine, we can manage." He grins, excited.

links.title: You: ""I kicked the programmer out, she w..."
links.text: "I kicked the programmer out, she won't bother you anymore. Time to dance!"

links.title: Andre: ""Really?" He smiles, happier than h..."
links.text: "Really?" He smiles, happier than he's ever been before. "We are grateful, cop-man. You're a true ally and the augury of a new era of *ANODIC DANCE MUSIC*."

links.title: Noid: ""You crazy motherfucker.""
links.text: "You crazy motherfucker."

links.title: Andre: ""And... what about the side busines..."
links.text: "And... what about the side business? Have you made up your mind?"

links.title: You: ""You mean the drug lab? Yeah, that'..."
links.text: "You mean the drug lab? Yeah, that's not going to happen. It's illegal, you see." (Refuse to set it up.)

links.title: Andre: ""Aw man, really?!" His smile wanes..."
links.text: "Aw man, really?!" His smile wanes slightly. "You're a complete ballbuster."

links.title: Andre: ""Fine..." He seems disappointed. "W..."
links.text: "Fine..." He seems disappointed. "We can make do. It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later." Andre waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: "[Leave the tent.]"
links.text: [Leave the tent.]

links.title: You: ""Proceed with the side business, bu..."
links.text: "Proceed with the side business, but I want a cut." (Allow them to set it up.)

links.title: Noid: ""No." The one with the necklace sta..."
links.text: "No." The one with the necklace stares at you coldly. "You don't get to squeeze out every drop of us after keeping us in the dark for so long."

links.title: Andre: ""Noid!" Andre turns to his friend...."
links.text: "Noid!" Andre turns to his friend. "Let's be reasonable here! We could use a friendly face in the station." He turns back to you with a wide smile on his face.

links.title: Andre: ""How about 50%? It's more than a fa..."
links.text: "How about 50%? It's more than a fair deal. We good?"

links.title: You: ""Hang on, I thought I'd get it righ..."
links.text: "Hang on, I thought I'd get it right now?"

links.title: Andre: ""Come now, it'll take weeks to get..."
links.text: "Come now, it'll take weeks to get everything set up, start making the produce, and deliver it around to the needy. This is a lengthy process."

links.title: You: ""Alright.""
links.text: "Alright."

links.title: Andre: ""Alright!" He grins. "It's going to..."
links.text: "Alright!" He grins. "It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later!" Andre waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: ""Side business? I don't know what y..."
links.text: "Side business? I don't know what you're talking about." (Turn a blind eye.)

links.title: Andre: ""Of course!" He gives you a knowing..."
links.text: "Of course!" He gives you a knowing nod. "I meant the bar, obviously. Why am I even talking about this?" Andre grins as if this settles it.

links.title: Andre: ""It's going to take us a bit to mov..."
links.text: "It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later!" He waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: "[Leave the tent.]"
links.text: [Leave the tent.]

links.title: Andre: ""And... you haven't changed your mi..."
links.text: "And... you haven't changed your mind about our little side business, have you?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I have been thinking....""
links.text: "Actually, I have been thinking...."

links.title: Noid: ""No." The one with the necklace sta..."
links.text: "No." The one with the necklace stares at you coldly. "You don't get to squeeze out every drop of us and then 'change your mind'."

links.title: Noid: ""We're setting up the shop. It's to..."
links.text: "We're setting up the shop. It's too late to turn around now. Deal with it, it was your decision, cop-man."

links.title: Egg Head: ""DEAL!" yells Egg Head."
links.text: "DEAL!" yells Egg Head.

links.title: Noid: ""No." The one with the necklace sta..."
links.text: "No." The one with the necklace stares at you coldly. "You don't get to take all our money and then 'change your mind'.

links.title: Noid: ""No." The one with the necklace sta..."
links.text: "No." The one with the necklace stares at you coldly. "You don't get to say one thing and then 'change your mind'. We trusted you, cop-man."

links.title: Noid: ""We're setting up the shop. It's to..."
links.text: "We're setting up the shop. It's too late to turn around now."

links.title: Egg Head: ""TRUST!" yells Egg Head."
links.text: "TRUST!" yells Egg Head.

links.title: You: ""I'm a man of my word.""
links.text: "I'm a man of my word."

links.title: Andre: ""Alright!" Andre grins as if this s..."
links.text: "Alright!" Andre grins as if this settles it. "It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later!" He waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: "[Leave the tent.]"
links.text: [Leave the tent.]

links.title: Andre: ""And... you're still sure about kee..."
links.text: "And... you're still sure about keeping out our little side business, right?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I have been thinking....""
links.text: "Actually, I have been thinking...."

links.title: Egg Head: ""No." A smile vanishes from Egg Hea..."
links.text: "No." A smile vanishes from Egg Head's face as he looks around the room. "No, I thought we agreed to do this pure and true. Guys, we're not changing our mind."

links.title: You: ""Oh, you mean the *illegal drug lab..."
links.text: "Oh, you mean the *illegal drug lab*? There will be no shady shenanigans in the church, only love and anodic dance music."

links.title: Andre: ""Fine..." He seems disappointed. "W..."
links.text: "Fine..." He seems disappointed. "We can make do. It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later." Andre waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: "[Leave the tent.]"
links.text: [Leave the tent.]

links.title: You: ""I'm glad I could help.""
links.text: "I'm glad I could help."

links.title: Andre: ""We appreciate it." He grins. "It's..."
links.text: "We appreciate it." He grins. "It's going to take us a bit to move our stuff inside. A couple of hours, maybe. Come check back later!" Andre waves to the other speedfreaks. "Let's get moving!"

links.title: You: "[Leave the tent.]"
links.text: [Leave the tent.]

links.title: You: ""Actually, I want to talk about som..."
links.text: "Actually, I want to talk about something else."

links.title: Andre: ""Hm." He sounds disappointed. "But..."
links.text: "Hm." He sounds disappointed. "But do let us know if something changes in the church..."

links.title: Andre: ""And...?" He tenses up. "What happe..."
links.text: "And...?" He tenses up. "What happened?"

links.title: You: ""What's the deal with Egg Head? I w..."
links.text: "What's the deal with Egg Head? I want to talk to him."

links.title: Andre: ""He's a quiet man, mostly communica..."
links.text: "He's a quiet man, mostly communicates through music... and by being a master of ceremonies."

links.title: You: ""Uh, what's a master of ceremonies?""
links.text: "Uh, what's a master of ceremonies?"

links.title: Andre: ""You know, a host. A declaimer of s..."
links.text: "You know, a host. A declaimer of slogans. He's a performer. Gets the people going."

links.title: Drama: "Interesting, sire. A bit like you t..."
links.text: Interesting, sire. A bit like you then. An 'MC', for short.

links.title: You: ""How do *you* communicate with him?""
links.text: "How do *you* communicate with him?"

links.title: Andre: ""Well..." he shrugs, "...he's just..."
links.text: "Well..." he shrugs, "...he's just kinda here, I don't really know how to *communicate* with him."

links.title: You: ""Have you ever *really* talked to h..."
links.text: "Have you ever *really* talked to him?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, sometimes... when I, like, s..."
links.text: "Yeah, sometimes... when I, like, stumble and find my way into his centre. You have to hear a lot of 'hard core to the mega' first, though."

links.title: Egg Head: "The man smiles mysteriously -- choo..."
links.text: The man smiles mysteriously -- choosing to let the beat speak for itself.

links.title: Interfacing: "I get it. He's a puzzle."
links.text: I get it. He's a puzzle.

links.title: You: ""Oh, that makes sense. Another ques..."
links.text: "Oh, that makes sense. Another question then."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: You: ""You mentioned some kind Ecclesiast..."
links.text: "You mentioned some kind Ecclesiastes own the church. Who are these Ecclesiastes?"

links.title: Andre: ""Oh yeah, that's a Meteoran name fo..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, that's a Meteoran name for the Founding Party. Thought it'd be cool to use it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "If you don't know what the Founding..."
links.text: If you don't know what the Founding Party is, there might be a way to mask it with minor demagoguery.

links.title: You: ""Before we go on, what do you mean..."
links.text: "Before we go on, what do you mean by *Meteoran*?"

links.title: Andre: ""You know -- of Meteo. Concerning M..."
links.text: "You know -- of Meteo. Concerning Meteo."

links.title: You: ""Meteo?""
links.text: "Meteo?"

links.title: Andre: ""Meteo. A country. On Mundi?" He lo..."
links.text: "Meteo. A country. On Mundi?" He looks at you, squinting his eyes to see if you're kidding. "On the Mundi isola."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "One of the poorest of the first wor..."
links.text: One of the poorest of the first world nations today -- but once a great ancient civilization. Capital: Thylakos-by-Pisantic.

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a place. I've had enou..."
links.text: "Sounds like a place. I've had enough of those. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: You: ""Oh, the Founding Party. I do know..."
links.text: "Oh, the Founding Party. I do know them... but can you refresh my memory?"

links.title: Andre: ""Come to think of it, I've never re..."
links.text: "Come to think of it, I've never really looked them up, you know. I can't give you a precise definition, but they're a very powerful religious organization."

links.title: You: ""And?""
links.text: "And?"

links.title: Andre: ""And they have roots in ancient mas..."
links.text: "And they have roots in ancient mass society." He pauses. "And they're the custodians of the Perikarnassian Church. Plus they anoint the innocence. They, like, made the innocentic system, no?"

links.title: You: ""It doesn't sound like they would a..."
links.text: "It doesn't sound like they would appreciate a dance club in their church."

links.title: Andre: ""You're *totally* wrong about that...."
links.text: "You're *totally* wrong about that." He shakes his head.

links.title: Egg Head: ""The Perikarnassian Church is about..."
links.text: "The Perikarnassian Church is about *love*! Anodic music is about *love*! I got love for my Perikarnassian posse, *love* is the relay out of death! WE DANCE!!!" He violently shakes the tape player, as if to see if he can break it.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Love is HARD CORE!""
links.text: "Love is HARD CORE!"

links.title: Noid: ""Unity.""
links.text: "Unity."

links.title: Andre: ""UNITY!""
links.text: "UNITY!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Make some noise for my Insulindian..."
links.text: "Make some noise for my Insulindian posse!" He turns the volume up, then looks at you with a knowing nod. As if it's obvious you will now break into dance.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You feel it. The anodes and the cat..."
links.text: You feel it. The anodes and the cathodes coursing through you -- your big toe starts tapping along to the bass, as if testing the waters...

links.title: You: "No words, enjoy the beat. (Nod your..."
links.text: No words, enjoy the beat. (Nod your head.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Feels good."
links.text: Feels good.

links.title: You: ""I don't quite understand what you'..."
links.text: "I don't quite understand what you're talking about. What's a *posse*?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Your posse's like your people, man..."
links.text: "Your posse's like your people, man! Like you got your cop posse -- you look out for each other and you party together. That's a posse!"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two men and a woman stand on the be..."
links.text: Two men and a woman stand on the beach, under a row of houses long abandoned to war damage. The words "Feld Electrical" have peeled off the turn-of-the-century waterfront development. One of the men carries a small boy on his shoulders. The boy looks up at the faded logo.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The woman says to him: "Good to see..."
links.text: The woman says to him: "Good to see you here, special consultant. We're worried about the lieutenant-yefreitor."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""Why are you worried about the lieu..."
links.text: "Why are you worried about the lieutenant-yefreitor?" asks the boy. Then a wave comes crashing in.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "And where is your posse, detective?..."
links.text: And where is your posse, detective? Nothing comes to you. The world is silent.

links.title: You: ""It sounds like you're just saying..."
links.text: "It sounds like you're just saying random things: love, posse, make noise."

links.title: Andre: ""Are we?" He looks at you mysteriou..."
links.text: "Are we?" He looks at you mysteriously.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a wave crashing outside, n..."
links.text: You hear a wave crashing outside, not far. It's a big one. The rumble dissipates into the bassline...

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeaahh..." The one with the large..."
links.text: "Yeaahh..." The one with the large head really enjoys it when his friend gets mysterious.

links.title: You: ""I guess love *can* be pretty hard..."
links.text: "I guess love *can* be pretty hard core..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh yeah, it can!""
links.text: "Oh yeah, it can!"

links.title: Andre: ""He's coming around." He nods at hi..."
links.text: "He's coming around." He nods at his friend, then turns to you with a mischievous grin: "You're *getting* it."

links.title: You: ""I now understand it was *lame* of..."
links.text: "I now understand it was *lame* of me to suggest otherwise. Anodic music *is* about love and so is the Perikarnassian Church." (Proceed.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAAGH! Yekokataa -- the place to..."
links.text: "YEAAGH! Yekokataa -- the place to be!"

links.title: Empathy: "He seems ecstatic that you share hi..."
links.text: He seems ecstatic that you share his vision of Perikarnassianism.

links.title: Noid: ""Do it for the masses, do it for th..."
links.text: "Do it for the masses, do it for the crew." His friend forms a fist with a screwdriver still in his hand. Approvingly so.

links.title: Andre: ""I didn't want to say it, but it *w..."
links.text: "I didn't want to say it, but it *was* pretty lame of you to imply otherwise. Anyway, you got more questions?"

links.title: Egg Head: "The one with the large head is stil..."
links.text: The one with the large head is still looking at you, nodding his head, waiting for your body to start moving...

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah, let it out! Let the disco hap..."
links.text: Yeah, let it out! Let the disco happen. Bring the disco into this world! Get this church shit on and then dance there motherfucker!

links.title: Composure: "You feel like you could go for a li..."
links.text: You feel like you could go for a little disco when -- or if -- they get this club going. You've got it in you.

links.title: You: ""No. This is too much. No sane orga..."
links.text: "No. This is too much. No sane organization would want this level of absurdity in their church." (Proceed.)

links.title: Andre: ""That's pretty down-beat. I think I..."
links.text: "That's pretty down-beat. I think I speak for all of us when I say we expected the law to be more open to the idea of love, unity, and the Perikarnassian posse. Especially since you're the one who helped us get inside the church." He looks around.

links.title: You: ""That's just the way it is.""
links.text: "That's just the way it is."

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah," he shrugs with melancholy...."
links.text: "Yeah," he shrugs with melancholy. "I guess it is. So, you got more questions?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry the law doesn't share yo..."
links.text: "I'm sorry the law doesn't share your vision."

links.title: Andre: ""Well..." He pauses for a moment. "..."
links.text: "Well..." He pauses for a moment. "We're sorry too. So, you got more questions?"

links.title: Andre: ""That's pretty down-beat. I think I..."
links.text: "That's pretty down-beat. I think I speak for all of us when I say we expected the law to be more open to the idea of love, unity, and the Perikarnassian posse."

links.title: You: ""Now Andre -- in your opinion -- wo..."
links.text: "Now Andre -- in your opinion -- would this ancient religious organization who *anoints the innocence* want a dance club in one of their churches?"

links.title: Andre: ""Totally." There isn't a trace of d..."
links.text: "Totally." There isn't a trace of doubt in his voice.

links.title: You: ""They sound like exactly the kind o..."
links.text: "They sound like exactly the kind of people who would want loud dance music in their church!"

links.title: Andre: ""You're right, they do!" he says, w..."
links.text: "You're right, they do!" he says, without the slightest hint of irony.

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Good. Now, let's talk about..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Good. Now, let's talk about something else."

links.title: You: "(Mask it.) "Now humour me, Andre --..."
links.text: (Mask it.) "Now humour me, Andre -- what is the Founding Party?"

links.title: You: ""And what is the *Founding Party*?""
links.text: "And what is the *Founding Party*?"

links.title: You: ""I wanted to ask you about this ten..."
links.text: "I wanted to ask you about this tent full of equipment."

links.title: You: "No words. Just dance."
links.text: No words. Just dance.

links.title: You: ""'Spookiness' is not a matter for p..."
links.text: "'Spookiness' is not a matter for police investigation."

links.title: Andre: ""You know, officer, you really shou..."
links.text: "You know, officer, you really should judge that for yourself. But keep in mind, their spookiness is the kind that keeps us from restoring this church into a community centre. And a place of spiritual refuge."

links.title: Noid: ""Also, they don't heat or clean the..."
links.text: "Also, they don't heat or clean the building. Shit's gonna collapse."

links.title: Egg Head: ""People just wanna spin tapes witho..."
links.text: "People just wanna spin tapes without them spookin' it up! Place has bad sines! No one can dance like that."

links.title: Andre: ""Thank you, Egg Head...""
links.text: "Thank you, Egg Head..."

links.title: Andre: ""So you're gonna look into it, righ..."
links.text: "So you're gonna look into it, right?" He turns to you. "It *should* be a police matter -- getting them out. Whatever spooky stuff they're doing, I'm sure it's not what the Ecclesiastes meant their property for."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Going to the island can wait. This..."
links.text: Going to the island can wait. This is super important.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Going to the island is your fate, t..."
links.text: Going to the island is your fate, this is an ACT OF FREE WILL. Say yes to CHOICE!

links.title: Andre: ""And sadder yet because the dopehea..."
links.text: "And sadder yet because the dopeheads and burnouts holed up in there are *the worst* kind."

links.title: Composure: "He leans back a little, watching yo..."
links.text: He leans back a little, watching you with a steady, serious gaze, letting you imagine just how bad those 'dopeheads' and 'burnouts' really are.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Good. This calls for an *opinion*...."
links.text: Good. This calls for an *opinion*. You're an expert in those.

links.title: You: ""I don't know, I'm a bit of a dopeh..."
links.text: "I don't know, I'm a bit of a dopehead myself..."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, if it was just like that," he..."
links.text: "Oh, if it was just like that," he rushes to reassure you, "it would be fine. But they're also *spooky*."

links.title: You: ""What exactly do you mean by *spook..."
links.text: "What exactly do you mean by *spooky*?"

links.title: Andre: ""I was hoping you would be the judg..."
links.text: "I was hoping you would be the judge of that, officer. All I can say is, their spookiness is the kind that keeps us from restoring this church into a community centre. And a place of spiritual refuge."

links.title: You: ""I don't know, I indulge a little t..."
links.text: "I don't know, I indulge a little too sometimes..."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, that's all fine, of course" he..."
links.text: "Oh, that's all fine, of course" he rushes to reassure you. "But these people -- they're also *spooky*."

links.title: You: ""Are they foreigners? I bet they're..."
links.text: "Are they foreigners? I bet they're foreigners."

links.title: Andre: ""Could be, we don't know for sure...."
links.text: "Could be, we don't know for sure. But we do know they are *spooky*."

links.title: You: ""What kind?""
links.text: "What kind?"

links.title: Andre: ""The *spooky* kind.""
links.text: "The *spooky* kind."

links.title: You: ""I won't stand for narcomaniacs of..."
links.text: "I won't stand for narcomaniacs of any kind. No *narcomaniacs* on my watch." (Shake your head gravely.)

links.title: Andre: ""Yes, yes. And the worst part is --..."
links.text: "Yes, yes. And the worst part is -- they're also *spooky*."

links.title: You: ""I feel like you may be laying this..."
links.text: "I feel like you may be laying this on a bit thick. What's really so bad about these 'dopeheads' and 'burnouts'?"

links.title: Andre: ""They're *spooky*.""
links.text: "They're *spooky*."

links.title: You: ""Now's not a great time to dance, i..."
links.text: "Now's not a great time to dance, is it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, detective. It is not." The lie..."
links.text: "No, detective. It is not." The lieutenant looks toward the church door. "We really should get to the Whirling-in-Rags. Now."

links.title: You: "Maybe everything isn't quite as you..."
links.text: Maybe everything isn't quite as you've been told? Take a moment to analyse.

links.title: You: ""I don't understand a single thing..."
links.text: "I don't understand a single thing you're saying."

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah," he shrugs with melancholy...."
links.text: "Yeah," he shrugs with melancholy. "I know you don't. So, you got more questions?"

links.title: Egg Head: "The one with the large head is stil..."
links.text: The one with the large head is still looking at you, nodding his head, waiting for your body to start moving... his expectation is fierce...

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah let it out! Let the disco happ..."
links.text: Yeah let it out! Let the disco happen. Bring the disco into this world!

links.title: Half Light: "You can't be scared of moving a lil..."
links.text: You can't be scared of moving a lil bit, are you?! Get the grind on!

links.title: Egg Head: "The one with the large head is stil..."
links.text: The one with the large head is still looking at you, nodding his head, waiting for your body to start moving... his expectation is fierce...

links.title: You: ""That's it for now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "That's it for now." [Leave.]

links.title: Andre: ""Goodbye, officer.""
links.text: "Goodbye, officer."

links.title: Andre: ""Be careful in there, officer. And..."
links.text: "Be careful in there, officer. And tell us how it goes, yeah? We'll be here."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh! Oh! You should have the key. W..."
links.text: "Oh! Oh! You should have the key. We had to padlock the door to the church to keep more vagrants from wandering in... Noid, give the officer the key!"

links.title: Andre: ""You can always come ask for the ke..."
links.text: "You can always come ask for the key to the church if you change your mind. Keep it cool, officer." He winks at you.

links.title: Empathy: "He doesn't look resigned at all. Pr..."
links.text: He doesn't look resigned at all. Probably counting on your curiosity to get the best of you sooner or later.

links.title: Andre: ""If you do decide to look into the..."
links.text: "If you do decide to look into the matter of the church, you know where to find us." He flashes you a confident smile.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Hi again. So, uh... How're things..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hi again. So, uh... How're things going?" He looks excited. The tips of his hair are sharp and white. The bleach has consumed almost all of the toothbrush on the mirror in front of him.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Hi again. Have you changed your mi..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hi again. Have you changed your mind? You changed your mind, right?" The tips of his hair are sharp and white. The bleach has consumed almost all of the toothbrush on the mirror in front of him.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: "You see a youngish man bleaching th..."
dialogueTree.text: You see a youngish man bleaching the tips of his hair with a toothbrush. He puts the toothbrush down and extends his hand in greeting.

links.title: Andre: ""Hello, I'm Andre. It's a pleasure..."
links.text: "Hello, I'm Andre. It's a pleasure to meet you."

links.title: Conceptualization: "There is definitely something futur..."
links.text: There is definitely something futuristic about his hair, aggressively so. You get the sense that *this* is what the future will look like...

links.title: Conceptualization: "Imbecilic. Yes, should the future e..."
links.text: Imbecilic. Yes, should the future ever come, it will look deeply imbecilic. Like this guy.

links.title: You: "Shake his hand."
links.text: Shake his hand.

links.title: Andre: "His grip is strong, sweaty, and war..."
links.text: His grip is strong, sweaty, and warm. He's trying to project and inspire confidence.

links.title: Andre: ""This is my posse: Noid....""
links.text: "This is my posse: Noid...."

links.title: You: "Don't shake it."
links.text: Don't shake it.

links.title: Andre: ""This is my posse: Noid..." He paus..."
links.text: "This is my posse: Noid..." He pauses with his hand still hanging in the air.

links.title: Noid: "The young man with earrings looks a..."
links.text: The young man with earrings looks at you suspiciously.

links.title: Andre: ""...and Egg Head.""
links.text: "...and Egg Head."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Egg!" he yells. The tape player hi..."
links.text: "Egg!" he yells. The tape player high above his head continues to blast strange music.

links.title: Andre: ""Together with Acele Berger -- who'..."
links.text: "Together with Acele Berger -- who's out there right now, doing some *seriously* progressive sonic experimentation -- we like to think of ourselves as 'music venue organizers.'"

links.title: You: ""Wait, how many music venues have y..."
links.text: "Wait, how many music venues have you organized?"

links.title: Andre: ""We have many in the pipeline, offi..."
links.text: "We have many in the pipeline, officer."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That means they haven't set up a si..."
links.text: That means they haven't set up a single one yet.

links.title: You: ""Why are you here?""
links.text: "Why are you here?"

links.title: Andre: ""You see, we've been all over Jamro..."
links.text: "You see, we've been all over Jamrock North, prospecting for real estate to establish a new venue in..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Also for talent!""
links.text: "Also for talent!"

links.title: Andre: ""Yes, thank you, Egg Head. And, whi..."
links.text: "Yes, thank you, Egg Head. And, while there is no shortage of raw, unfettered talent spinning tapes in Jamrock, we've had rotten luck with the real estate part."

links.title: Noid: ""Place is a shithole.""
links.text: "Place is a shithole."

links.title: Andre: ""I apologize for my friend Noid's p..."
links.text: "I apologize for my friend Noid's potty-mouth. *I* realize this is not how you speak to a police officer. He has authority issues."

links.title: You: ""There's no need. The place is pret..."
links.text: "There's no need. The place is pretty bad."

links.title: Andre: ""Which brings me to the problem of..."
links.text: "Which brings me to the problem of occupied ecclesiastical property. I bet you've noticed the derelict hive of *narcomania* on the coast?"

links.title: You: ""Next time, watch yourself.""
links.text: "Next time, watch yourself."

links.title: Noid: ""I will, law-man." The young man no..."
links.text: "I will, law-man." The young man nods and drops a drill chuck into a plastic container.

links.title: You: ""Was there something you wanted?""
links.text: "Was there something you wanted?"

links.title: You: ""Was there something you wanted? Yo..."
links.text: "Was there something you wanted? Your friend Acele said there was a problem with the church."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, so you've met her? Good, good...."
links.text: "Oh, so you've met her? Good, good." He nods.

links.title: Empathy: "He's not as glad as he would like y..."
links.text: He's not as glad as he would like you to think. There is concern in his voice.

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah -- it's a matter of occupied..."
links.text: "Yeah -- it's a matter of occupied ecclesiastical property. I bet you've noticed the derelict hive of *narcomania* on the coast?"
